title: Kitsumkalum (Kalum) River
whats_it_like: Big water play run.  At high water, one of the best play runs in BC.

difficulty.text: III+ to IV.  Pushy at high water - a swim would be unpleasant.

scouting_portaging: Both of the significant rapids can be scouted and portaged with difficulty.

time.original: 30 min - 2 hr.  Level dependent.  Are you stopping to surf?

when_to_go: All year.  May-June for high water snowmelt and best Dog Dish levels.  Fall rain provides frequent high water.
